org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom
Class AeXMLFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom.AeXMLFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeVisitor
public class AeXMLFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeVisitor

Formats an AeFastNode object to an XML stream.

Escapes special characters in the specified string. If aIsAttribute is true, then this will perform processing appropriate for attribute values.
